title: Car Drift Racing
description: Realistic mobile drift racing with fine-tuned car physics.
shortDesc: Master the art of drifting in this fast-paced mobile racer. Perform smooth drifts, unlock high-performance cars, and race across visually diverse tracks. Built for precision handling and rewarding style-based gameplay, with support for upgrades, coins, and IAP..
roles: Led full development including physics, UI, monetization, and performance optimization.
Implemented realistic drift physics with handbrake, steering, and tire grip logic.
Created responsive car controls for both tilt and touch modes.
Designed multiple tracks with drift zones and score-based rewards.
Built garage system with unlockable cars, upgrades, and tuning options.
Integrated rewarded ads, IAP for coin packs, and daily login rewards.
Optimized for smooth performance on low-end Android devices with minimal APK size.

contributions.name: Drift Physics & Controls
contributions.shortDesc: Built custom drift physics for tight and responsive racing.
details: Simulated realistic drift dynamics using Unity Wheel Colliders and lateral slip.
Implemented traction loss, steering sensitivity, and friction-based control.
Enabled handbrake drift triggers and combo scoring based on drift angle/duration.
Supported both tilt and on-screen button controls with smooth feedback.

contributions.name: Garage, Cars & Upgrades
contributions.shortDesc: Created a progression system with customizable and unlockable vehicles.
details: Built a garage system to showcase, select, and upgrade cars.
Defined car stats (speed, handling, drift efficiency) using ScriptableObjects.
Implemented upgrade logic for tires, engines, and drift boosts.
Created visually unique car skins and tuning packs for IAP integration.

contributions.name: Tracks & Level Design
contributions.shortDesc: Designed challenging tracks to test player control and style.
details: Created tracks with varying road widths, curve types, and drift zones.
Used cones, barriers, and environment props to guide player path.
Balanced score thresholds and combo rewards to encourage mastery.
Added environment variety: urban, desert, night, and mountain tracks.

contributions.name: Monetization & Progression
contributions.shortDesc: Balanced free-to-play economy with rewarding progression.
details: Integrated rewarded ads for double coins, retries, and unlock skips.
Added IAPs for coin packs and premium car unlocks.
Designed coin-based economy for upgrades and progression pacing.
Incorporated daily login bonuses, challenges, and drift-based goals.

contributions.name: Performance & UI
contributions.shortDesc: Delivered a smooth, accessible, and visually polished experience.
details: Optimized draw calls, lightmaps, and audio memory to run efficiently on mid-range devices.
Designed clean UI for drift scores, speedometer, minimap, and pause panel.
Maintained consistent 60 FPS across Android targets with scalable quality settings.
Published to Google Play with all required assets, metadata, and APK targeting.
